text: Adam Wolff (14 August 1899 - 17 February 1984) was a Polish historian and sailor, who represented Poland at the 1928 Summer Olympics in Amsterdam, Netherlands. == References == Category:Sailors at the 1928 Summer Olympics – 12' Dinghy Category:Olympic sailors of Poland Category:1899 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Polish male sailors (sport) Category:Sportspeople from Warsaw Category:People from Warsaw Governorate Category:20th-century Polish people
title: Adam Wolff
